message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for around $60.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $110 is still more than I'm comfortable with. How about we split the difference from your last offer and mine, say around $85?
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I can do a bit better than $85, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $80. How about $92.50?
Alice, you're getting closer!  I'm willing to bump up my offer a bit. How about $87?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can meet you at $90, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a fair price for a great product.
